targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND interface =~ /ens3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND interface =~ /ens3/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)

SELECT mean(tcp_close) as CLOSED, mean(tcp_close_wait) as CLOSE_WAIT, mean(tcp_closing) as CLOSING, mean(tcp_established) as ESTABLISHED, mean(tcp_fin_wait1) as FIN_WAIT1, mean(tcp_fin_wait2) as FIN_WAIT2, mean(tcp_last_ack) as LAST_ACK, mean(tcp_syn_recv) as SYN_RECV, mean(tcp_syn_sent) as SYN_SENT, mean(tcp_time_wait) as TIME_WAIT FROM "netstat" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(load1) as short,mean(load5) as medium,mean(load15) as long FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT mean(used) as used FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /itcher-minio/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_recv),1s)*8 as "in"  FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /itcher-web1/ AND interface =~ /eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean(bytes_sent),1s)*8 as "out" FROM "net" WHERE host =~ /itcher-web1/ AND interface =~ /eth0/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * fill(none)
